Intro-description: The Nail Salon: Creating a Masterpiece on Every Finger
The Nail Salon: The Nail Salon: Creating a Masterpiece on Every Finger
Welcome to AfiArt: Welcome to AfiArt salon in the magical world of manicure and pedicure. Every woman dreams of having beautiful nails with a smooth coating and an impeccable shape.
AfiArt description: Our salon provides hand and foot nail care services where you will enjoy the magical atmosphere and get the desired result. Depending on your desire, our master, based on his professional experience, will recommend and then carefully and accurately give your nails the correct shape. A universal coating that will suit any style will give special strength to your nails and retain an attractive shine and brightness for a long time...
relaxation-description: Manicure and pedicure it is also a great relaxation time. During the procedure, you can relax and focus on pleasant sensations and forget about everyday affairs for a while...
benefits description: Manicure and pedicure are complex procedures consisting of a healing effect. Well-made manicure and pedicure will make your hands and feet attractive, which affects the creation of a magnificent image of a person...
Appeal description: Well-groomed nails give each person additional confidence in their attractiveness. AfiArt salon will make a manicure that will attract attention and will suit any evening event and look...

Gel polish manicure and Gel strengthenin: Gel polish manicure and Gel strengthening
desc-one: Safe e-file or classic manicure including nail shaping, precise cuticles work, cuticle oil and hand lotion massage.
desc-two: Removal gel polish, shaping, cuticle removal and applying fresh gel polish, design not included. If you have a long nails you should to pick different service named "Hand gel strengthening".
desc-three: Removal gel polish, shaping, cuticle removal and applying hard gel and gel polish. Design not included.
desc-four: Removal polish, shaping, cuticle removal, callus removal, using pododisk, foot scrub, lotion, oil and massage.
desc-five: Removal polish, shaping, cuticle removal, callus removal, using pododisk, foot scrub lotion, oil and massage.
desc-six: Removal gel polish, shaping, cuticle removal, using pododisk, foot scrub, lotion, oil and massage.
